trans-unit.source: Represents a section within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態檔內的區段。

trans-unit.source: You use the ConfigurationSection class to implement a custom section type.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ConfigurationSection 類別來實作自訂的區段類型。

trans-unit.source: Extend the ConfigurationSection class to provide custom handling and programmatic access to custom configuration sections.
trans-unit.target: 擴充以提供自訂的處理和以程式設計方式存取自訂組態區段的 ConfigurationSection 類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how use custom configuration sections, see [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using ConfigurationSection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用自訂組態區段，請參閱[How to︰ 建立自訂組態區段使用 ConfigurationSection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A section registers its handling type with an entry in the `configSections` element.
trans-unit.target: 區段中的項目以註冊其處理型別`configSections`項目。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the configuration file excerpt shown in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節所示的組態檔摘錄。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In previous versions of the .NET Framework, configuration section handlers were used to make changes to configuration settings programmatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 組態區段處理常式用來變更組態設定在舊版的.NET Framework 中，以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: Now, all the default configuration sections are represented by classes that extend the ConfigurationSection class.
trans-unit.target: 現在，所有的預設組態區段會以擴充 ConfigurationSection 類別的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: To use the ConfigurationSection constructor, you need to define a custom section type first.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的 ConfigurationSection 建構函式，您需要先定義自訂的區段類型。

trans-unit.source: For an example see the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>類別概觀。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: Reads XML from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從組態檔讀取 XML。

trans-unit.source: Deserialization refers to the reading of XML data from a configuration file, its transformation into real-time data, and its storage in an object.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化指從組態檔、 其轉換成即時資料，以及其儲存在物件中的讀取 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, which reads from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>物件，從組態檔讀取。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: reader found no elements in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: reader在組態檔中找到任何項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a custom object when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回當在衍生類別中覆寫的自訂物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method is called at run time, the configuration system first creates an appropriate instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class, and then returns the object it obtains from the GetRuntimeObject method.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法在執行階段呼叫，組態系統會先建立適當的執行個體<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>類別，並再傳回它會從 GetRuntimeObject 方法取得的物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> </xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, GetRuntimeObject simply returns the object that represents the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> from which it is called.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，GetRuntimeObject 只會傳回物件，代表<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>的呼叫。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: The object representing the section.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示一節。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this configuration element has been modified since it was last saved or loaded when implemented in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 表示自上次儲存或衍生類別中實作時，載入後是否已修改這個組態項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已修改的項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resets the value of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.IsModified*> method to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when implemented in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 值重設<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.IsModified*>方法<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>衍生類別中實作時</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.IsModified*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.SectionInformation"></xref> object that contains the non-customizable information and functionality of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.SectionInformation"></xref>物件，其中包含的非自訂的資訊和功能<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SectionInformation"></xref> that contains the non-customizable information and functionality of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SectionInformation"> </xref> ，其中包含的非自訂的資訊和功能<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML string containing an unmerged view of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object as a single section to write to a file.
trans-unit.target: 建立包含的檢視，未合併的 XML 字串<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref>物件做為一個單一區段，將寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Serialization refers to the transformation of real-time data, contained in an object, to XML format and its storage to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 序列化是指包含物件，以 XML 格式和其存放裝置的組態檔中的即時資料的轉換。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> instance to use as the parent when performing the un-merge.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>執行取消合併時，使用做為父系的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the section to create.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的區段名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode"></xref> instance to use when writing to a string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode"> </xref>寫入字串時要使用的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing an unmerged view of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含的檢視，未合併的 XML 字串<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified element should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的目標版本的序列化組態物件階層架構時，是否應該序列化指定的項目[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the specified element is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 建立的每個組態區段[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本必須明確覆寫這個方法並傳回`true`，但只有指定的項目是指定之版本的有效[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 針對較舊版本所建立的現有組態區段[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有變更。

trans-unit.source: The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 基底型別包含這個方法一律會傳回的預設實作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default all configuration elements that are contained in the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作的組態區段，而且您不覆寫這個方法，預設的組態區段中所包含的所有組態項目會都序列化所有 framework 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object that is a candidate for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>是候選項目的序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object as it occurs in XML.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>物件在 XML 中發生。

trans-unit.source: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 目標版本[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: if the element should be serialized; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 element 應該序列化，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified property should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的目標版本的序列化組態物件階層架構時，是否應該序列化指定的屬性[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the specified property is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 建立的每個組態區段[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本必須明確覆寫這個方法並傳回`true`，但只有在指定的屬性是指定之版本的有效[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 針對較舊版本所建立的現有組態區段[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有變更。

trans-unit.source: The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 基底型別包含這個方法一律會傳回的預設實作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default all configuration properties that are contained in the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作的組態區段，而且您不覆寫這個方法，預設的組態區段中所包含的所有組態屬性會都序列化所有 framework 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> object that is a candidate for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"> </xref>是候選項目的序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> object as it occurs in XML.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>物件在 XML 中發生。

trans-unit.source: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 目標版本[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The parent element of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的父項目。

trans-unit.source: if the property should be serialized; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 property 應該序列化，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 指出是否目前<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref>序列化指定的目標版本的組態物件階層架構時，應該加以序列化執行個體[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the configuration section is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 建立的每個組態區段[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本必須明確覆寫這個方法並傳回`true`，但前提是組態區段會指定版本的有效[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 針對較舊版本所建立的現有組態區段[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有變更。

trans-unit.source: The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 基底型別包含這個方法一律會傳回的預設實作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作的組態區段，而且您不覆寫這個方法，預設的組態區段會序列化所有的 framework 版本。

trans-unit.source: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 目標版本[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current section should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該序列化目前這一節。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
